summary: Verified all 5 bug fixes for ERmate Emergency Room app. Backend: procedures_performed and drugs_administered fields now properly saved and retrieved. Frontend: 'Mark All Normal' button and individual 'Normal' selection both correctly auto-fill _additional_notes fields with detailed examination text.
passed_tests: Backend: POST /api/cases accepts and saves procedures_performed field
Backend: POST /api/cases accepts and saves drugs_administered field
Backend: PUT /api/cases/{id} can update procedures_performed field
Backend: Existing case eb29175c-caf5-488e-a89c-319a5adb2c64 returns procedures data
Frontend: 'Mark All Normal' button sets cvs_status='Normal'
Frontend: 'Mark All Normal' button fills cvs_additional_notes with detailed text
Frontend: 'Mark All Normal' button fills all exam system _additional_notes fields
Frontend: Individual 'Normal' selection for CVS auto-fills cvs_additional_notes
Frontend: Treatment tab shows 'Procedures are documented in the Notes tab' message
Frontend: Treatment tab does NOT show 'Procedures Done' section
Frontend: Notes tab shows 'Procedures Performed' section with categories
critical_code_review_comments: All 5 reported bugs have been fixed and verified
Backend CaseSheet model now includes procedures_performed and drugs_administered fields (lines 662-663)
CaseSheetCreate and CaseSheetUpdate models also include these fields (lines 683-684, 702-703)
Frontend updateNestedField function now uses _additional_notes suffix (line 1130)
Frontend Mark All Normal button now sets _additional_notes fields (lines 3496-3504)
seed_data_creation: Created 3 test cases with procedures_performed and drugs_administered via pytest
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 5 bug fixes verified working: 1) procedures_performed saved to DB, 2) drugs_administered saved to DB, 3) Mark All Normal uses _additional_notes fields, 4) Individual Normal selection uses _additional_notes fields, 5) Treatment tab shows procedures message instead of checkboxes. Test user: test@test.com / Test123!
